description:
User copies the target's species, weight, type, ability, calculated stats (except HP), and moves.  Copied moves will all have 5 PP remaining.  IV are copied for the purposes of hidden-power, but stats are not recalculated.

choice-band, choice-scarf, and choice-specs stay in effect, and the user must select a new move.

This move cannot be copied by mirror-move, nor forced by encore.
name: Transform
